name: Switch Stick
description:
Thanks for checking out our game submission!

Synopsis: This entire game is based around the game jam theme of SWITCH. Every time you collide with another car, whether by choice or not, you will switch with that car. Travel from location to location trying to take over every race, and take over the entire Grand Prix!

Important: Please note that we were unable to have time to create a background loader for the levels. When loading a level, the game will lock up for a second, but don't worry, your level is being loaded in the background.

Controls: (The game does have full controller support for Xbox or similar controllers!)

Keyboard:
W = Acceleration
S = Reverse
A/D = Steering
Tab = Display Score Board
Space = Handbreak (Stop without Reverse)
Other Controls:
F5 = Reset Current Level
F11 = Fullscreen Mode
Controller:
Right Trigger = Acceleration
Left Trigger = Reverse
Left/Right (Left Stick) = Steering
Left Bumper = Display Score Board
X = Handbreak (Stop without Reverse)

Shortcuts (SPOILERS): The following link will link to a doc with all of the designed shortcuts currently in the game. 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cNg8PpnNNp77k1PsUP4_GOGKG2U7VPeMb0AHOcA2wgc/...

Any feedback or ratings during the duration of the jam is highly appreciated. We are planning on developing this game into a full Indie Title, so stay tuned for more updates.

You can also follow us on our socials to get updates about the project:
